markdown.markdown: ::: {.callout-note appearance="minimal"} [**Download CV (PDF)**](cv.pdf){.btn .btn-outline-primary .btn-sm role="button"} ::: ::: {.arrow-list} * **PhD in Psychological Sciences** (XLI Cycle) | University of Padova * *2025 - Present* * Supervisor: Prof. Gianmarco Altoè * **M.S. in Developmental Clinical Psychology** | University of Padova * *2023 - 2025* | **110 cum laude** * Thesis: *'Multiverse Meta-Analysis: Proposal of a New Inferential Approach with an Application to Depression Psychotherapy'* * Supervisor: Prof. Gianmarco Altoè | Co-Supervisor: Dr. Filippo Gambarota * **B.S. in Psychological Sciences and Techniques** | University of Padova * *2019 - 2023* | **109/110** * Thesis: *Bullying, Cyberbullying and Parenting Styles* * Supervisor: Prof. Tiziana Pozzoli ::: ## Professional Qualification ::: {.arrow-list} * **Licensed Psychologist (Section A)** * *Ordine degli Psicologi del Veneto* | N. 15759 (since Oct. 13, 2025) ::: ## Academic Publications ::: {.arrow-list} * **Manente, M.**, Altoè, G., Finos, L., & Gambarota, F. (in prep). *A Framework for Inference in Multiverse Meta-analysis with Applications to Real Case Studies*. * Marci, T., Calignano, G., **Manente, M.**, Menghini, L., & Liuzza, M. T. (in prep). *Evidence for a Two-Dimensional Structure of the Italian short-form Grit-S in Youth*. ::: ## Conference Presentations **2026** ::: {.arrow-list} * **Manente, M.**, Altoè, G., Finos, L., & Gambarota, F. (accepted). *Your meta-analysis depends on choices: A multiverse approach to solid inference*. Talk at Cognitive Science Arena (CSA), Bressanone. * **Manente, M.**, Finos, L., & Altoè, G. (submitted). *Does EMDR Really Work? A Multiverse Meta-Analysis of PTSD Treatment Efficacy*. Poster at ITRN Meeting, Verona. * **Manente, M.** (Invited Talk). *Multiverse Meta-Analysis: Assessing Robustness and Researcher Degrees of Freedom*. University of Innsbruck. ::: **2025** ::: {.arrow-list} * **Manente, M.**, Gambarota, F., Finos, L., Vesely, A., & Altoè, G. *Post-Selection Inference in Multiverse Meta-Analysis (PIMMA)*. EMPG Meeting, Padova. * **Manente, M.**, Gambarota, F., Finos, L., Vesely, A., & Altoè, G. *Enhancing Transparency and Rigor in Psychology*. AIP Sperimentale, Torino. * **Manente, M.**, Gambarota, F., Finos, L., Vesely, A., & Altoè, G. *Choices Shape Conclusions*. Psicostat Meeting (Online). * Sità, L., **Manente, M.**, et al. *Set up for a Methodological Review Board in Psychology*. Symposium at PYMS, Tilburg. ::: ## Methodological Training **Advanced Statistics (PhD Courses)** ::: {.arrow-list} * **Generalised Linear Models** (20h) | University of Padova (Dec 2025) * **Basics of Statistical Inference and Linear Models with R** (20h) | University of Padova (Nov-Dec 2025) * **Basics of R for Data Science** (10h) | University of Padova (Nov 2025) ::: **Summer Schools & Workshops** ::: {.arrow-list} * **Replicability Crisis in Science** (20h) | University of Padova (June 2025) * **BEYOND classical p-values** (30h) | University of Trento (May 2025) * **PreDoc Camp in Psychology & Cognitive Science** (20h) | University of Trento (April 2025) * **ARCA Course: PsychoPy3** (20h) | University of Padova (March 2025) ::: ## Work Experience ::: {.arrow-list} * **Educator** | CTRP 'I Cristalli' (VR) * *Apr 2025 - Sept 2025* * Facilitation of therapeutic interventions and multidisciplinary evaluations. * **Clinical Internship (500h)** | CTRP 'I Cristalli' (VR) * *July 2024 - Nov 2024* * Therapeutic groups (art/music therapy), drafting individualized plans (PTI). * **Clinical Internship (250h)** | Mater Salutis Hospital / Day Center 'Il Tulipano' (VR) * *2022 - 2023* * Support in rehabilitative sessions with psychiatric patients. ::: ## Skills **Languages** * **Italian:** Native * **English:** C1 (IELTS 8.0) * **Spanish:** Intermediate **Digital Skills** * **Advanced:** R, Quarto, Markdown, Data Visualization (ggplot2) * **Basic:** PsychoPy, Python, Zotero, Canva * **Focus:** Statistical modeling, experiment programming, meta-analysis ## Third Mission ::: {.arrow-list} * **Methodological Review Board (MRB) Development** | University of Padova * *March 2024 - Present* * Member of the Pilot Study Team. Designing a departmental review board to promote Open Science. * **La scienza è aperta: la scienza incontra la città** | University of Padova * *Nov 2025* | Organization Committee * Public engagement event promoting transparency in research. :::
